name: cleangene17
text: It was relatively easy to order, the price is always low, and, I especially like the no contact pick-up. Also, I ordered the plant based "meat" as a toping for one of my pizzas and it is very good!

text: The website makes ordering easy, the staff is always great.  Really like the "coupon" type specials for lower prices!
